originalMetadata.title: The Truth about Depression ( Nobody talks about )
originalMetadata.description:
Are you truly depressed or just trapped in a life that’s draining you?
This video will help you understand the difference.
With the rise of mental health awareness, many people confuse depression with burnout, boredom, or dopamine fatigue.
We break it down into 3 simple steps so you can figure out what you’re really going through—before you label yourself with something that isn’t true.

What you’ll learn in this video: ?

How to identify real depression vs lifestyle dysfunction.
Why most people are not depressed, just disconnected.
The exact 30-day test to check your mental state.
The power of structure, sunlight, and self-awareness.
When it’s time to seek help—and when it’s time to reset.


1. Are you really depressed or just unbalanced?
2. Most people aren’t depressed—here’s what’s actually wrong.
3. 3 signs it’s not depression, just dopamine burnout.
4. How to know if you’re depressed or just lazy.
5. Feeling empty? This might not be depression.
7. You’re not broken—you’re just living wrong.
8. Depression or dysfunction? Here’s how to tell.
9. Mental health myth: not everyone is depressed.
10. Stop misdiagnosing yourself—this is not depression.


#MentalClarity
#MindsetShift
#DepressionVsDisconnection
#SelfAwareness

This video is for educational and informational purposes only. The content is based on personal opinions and research and should not be considered professional advice. Viewer discretion is advised.
